Q1: How to start tracking carbon footprint?
A1: Grant location permission, choose your mode of transportation, then click the start button. When you reach your destination, click the stop button.

Q2: Is it possible to switch transportation modes midway?
A2: Yes, but each recording will only calculate based on the last selected transportation mode.

Q3: How to unlock the yellow badge?
A3: No idea.（ᗜ ‸ ᗜ）
